Instruction: Prepare Baking Pan: Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan.
Combine Wet Ingredients: In a large bowl, whisk together melted butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract until well combined.
Combine Dry Ingredients: In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, salt, and baking powder.
Combine Wet and Dry Ingredients: Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Do not overmix.
Fold in Chocolate Chips (Optional): If using, gently fold in chocolate chips.
Pour and Bake: Pour batter into prepared baking pan and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out with moist crumbs.
Cool and Serve: Let brownies cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before cutting into squares and serving.
